Package org.anddev.andengine.engine.options.resolutionpolicy

Interface Summary
IResolutionPolicy An implementation of the IResolutionPolicy interface is part of the EngineOptions.
 

Class Summary
BaseResolutionPolicy
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
FillResolutionPolicy This will maximize the SurfaceView to the parent's size if it has an exact size set.
FixedResolutionPolicy This will bind the SurfaceView to a certain size.
RatioResolutionPolicy This will maximize the SurfaceView and keeping a certain aspect ration ensuring objects won't be distorted.
RelativeResolutionPolicy This will scale the SurfaceView relative to the parent's size if this has an exact size set.
